name: places/ChIJf1h2mlBYwokRpSHXzewCy1w
formattedAddress: 503 W 51st St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 503 W 51st St, New York, NY 10019-5004, USA

originalText.text: Dr Tanzil is super efficient and professional.  Oscar was incredibly helpful selecting my lenses and just such a friendly person who explained everything with care and patience. He picked some lenses for me to try on that I wouldn’t have even thought of and I absolutely loved finding a new style! He’s great at recommending what looks good for your face type (and I needed the help!).

text.text: Dr Tanzil is super efficient and professional.  Oscar was incredibly helpful selecting my lenses and just such a friendly person who explained everything with care and patience. He picked some lenses for me to try on that I wouldn’t have even thought of and I absolutely loved finding a new style! He’s great at recommending what looks good for your face type (and I needed the help!).

originalText.text: My neighborhood optometrist for over five years. Have been helpful with addressing any concerns and available in a pinch. Service is always efficient and they’re always kind / patient when choosing lenses. Would recommend Dr. Tanzil to anyone looking for a reliable optometrist

text.text: My neighborhood optometrist for over five years. Have been helpful with addressing any concerns and available in a pinch. Service is always efficient and they’re always kind / patient when choosing lenses. Would recommend Dr. Tanzil to anyone looking for a reliable optometrist

originalText.text: I went to Dr. Tanzil before moving out of state. 100% the best eye doctor I've ever had. He's professional and direct. The staff in the office are all enormously helpful. And, I had some specific questions for them after I moved. I called and they helped me with a current issue I am dealing with -- so that's over the top customer service. Highly recommend if you live in the area.

text.text: I went to Dr. Tanzil before moving out of state. 100% the best eye doctor I've ever had. He's professional and direct. The staff in the office are all enormously helpful. And, I had some specific questions for them after I moved. I called and they helped me with a current issue I am dealing with -- so that's over the top customer service. Highly recommend if you live in the area.

originalText.text: The staff very kindly repaired my tilted sunglasses (not bought from them) with no delay and did not charge me anything for it. Appreciate their help!

text.text: The staff very kindly repaired my tilted sunglasses (not bought from them) with no delay and did not charge me anything for it. Appreciate their help!

originalText.text:
I would have given higher stars but the doctor there is quite abrupt, interrupts you at each turn and overrides your concerns or questions.
In contrast, the woman who works there, Frannie, is awesome. She is super attentive and gives you enough time and makes you feel comfortable.
The glasses I received, mostly covered by my insurance, the lens are not of great quality, and they charge you a $25 fee to send the frames to have lens fit in, that charge does not make sense to me, that’s why also deducting some stars
I can see some blur through the lens and the doctor just discarded my concern w when I brought it up, and now it’s a pair of useless glasses sitting at home.
